from linkman
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into linkman (id, name, account, phone_no, gender, email, company_id, flag, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update linkman set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_no = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select l.account,l.company_id companyId,l.create_time createTime,l.create_user createUser,l.email ,l.flag,l.gender,l.id,l.`name`,l.phone_no phoneNo,l.state,l.update_time updateTime,l.update_user updateUser from linkman l where company_id=#{companyId} and flag!="1"
